widgets.title: Revenue Now!
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(BookingRevenue) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 hour ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Most Revenue $$$
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(BookingRevenue) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 hour ago FACET BookingHotelName LIMIT 6

widgets.title: Most Popular Hotels
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  BookingHotelName LIMIT 6 since 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Best Selling Cities
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  BookingCity since 1 hour ago limit 6

widgets.title: Top Agents
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET BookingAgent since 1 hour ago limit 5

widgets.title: Room Types
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  BookingSmokingRoom since 1 hour ago
